Changelog
=========

v1.0.2 (2022-08-03)
-------------------
* Support ``setup.cfg`` with missing fields.

v1.0.1 (2022-08-02)
-------------------
* Use ``lxml`` for HTML parsing to support wider range of HTML, and add missing dependency ``packaging``.

v1.0.0 (2022-08-02)
-------------------
* First proof of concept version.
